Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: This is working as expected. We did not want to have to force devs to fix other people's problems. Instead, we only check for committed (in CI) and uncommitted changes (local). If a file is changed and it has the old style license, we ask them to fix it. We wanted to avoid a big-bang update as that would be disruptive to everyone else with CRs in the pipe. Maybe we should document this.

Action.author: rpjday
Action.body: Documenting it would be useful, as it caught me off-guard when I first noticed this, and I was convinced it was a bug.
